textAfterTable: Game Overview Warhammer 40,000: Storm of Vengeance is a strategy game developed by Eutechnyx and released on iOS, Android, Microsoft Windows. Storm of Vengeance is a lane strategy game for PC and mobile devices set in the dark, gothic universe of Warhammer 40,000. Storm of Vengeance tells the story of a pivotal moment in the Warhammer 40,000 universe, during the legendary planetary conflict on Piscina IV.
